source-interface.description: Source interface name. The interface must be a physical interface or loopback interface.

source-ipv6.description: Source IPv6 address of tunnel. If the source inferface is a physical interface, the source IPv6 address references the IPv6 address of the physical interface. If the source inferface is a loopback interface, the source IPv6 address must be on the same network segment as the IPv6 address of the loopback interface.

local-cookie-cipher.description: The value of the local ciphertext cookie. The ciphertext cookie is a string ranging from 1 to 8 characters for a unencrypted password and 48 or 108 characters for a encrypted password.

local-cookie-length.description: The length of the local cookie.

local-cookie-low.description: The value of the lower 4 bytes of the local cookie.

local-cookie-high.description: The value of the upper 4 bytes of the local cookie.

local-secondary-cookie-cipher.description: The value of the local secondary ciphertext cookie. The ciphertext cookie is a string ranging from 1 to 8 characters for a unencrypted password and 48 or 108 characters for a encrypted password.

local-secondary-cookie-length.description: The length of the local secondary cookie.

local-secondary-cookie-low.description: The value of the lower 4 bytes of the local secondary cookie.

local-secondary-cookie-high.description: The value of the upper 4 bytes of the local secondary cookie.

remote-cookie-cipher.description: The value of the remote ciphertext cookie. The ciphertext cookie is a string ranging from 1 to 8 characters for a unencrypted password and 48 or 108 characters for a encrypted password.

remote-cookie-length.description: The length of the remote cookie.

remote-cookie-low.description: The value of the lower 4 bytes of the remote cookie.

remote-cookie-high.description: The value of the upper 4 bytes of the remote cookie.

role.description: Whether the tunnel is a primary or injected tunnel.
Whether the tunnel is a primary or injected tunnel.
